thread.title_full: Traveling to TRAPPIST-1: How Long Would It Take? | Video

title: Traveling to TRAPPIST-1: How Long Would It Take? | Video
text:
Traveling to TRAPPIST-1: How Long Would It Take? | Video By Steve Spaleta | February 22, 2017 10:19pm ET 
The ultra cool dwarf star system is about 39 light-years from Earth. Find out how long it would take NASA’s Space Shuttle, the New Horizons spacecraft and Breakthrough Starshot’s proposed laser sail-propelled nanocraft to travel to the system that harbors 7 Earth-sized planets. credit : Space.com / visualizations courtesy: ESO/L. Calçada/spaceengine.org / Edited by @SteveSpaleta
